State of Louisiana,
City of New Orleans

Be it remembered that on this Twenty First day of May in the year one Thousand Eight Hundred & sixty Four Before me the undersigned notary, in & for the city of New Orleans, Parish of Orleans, state of Louisiana, came & appeared Robert Joseph Ker, a commission for the State of Kentucky, in the State of Louisiana, who being duly sworn declared & said, that he will well & faithfully perform all the duties incumbent upon him in his said capacity.
Sworn to and subscribed before me Hugh Madden a Notary public in and for the Parish of Orleans, State of Louisiana, duly commissioned and sworn, on this 21st day of May A D. 1864
